Notes.Text:
This update for libsoup fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-11021: Ignored invalid date when processing cookies to prevent out-of-bounds read (bsc#1250562).

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in the cookie date handling logic of the libsoup HTTP library, widely used by GNOME and other applications for web communication. When processing cookies with specially crafted expiration dates, the library may perform an out-of-bounds memory read. This flaw could result in unintended disclosure of memory contents, potentially exposing sensitive information from the process using libsoup.
